description: Facial recognition is a technology that identifies or verifies a person from a digital image or video frame. It is widely used in security, user authentication, and surveillance applications.
you_have_this_if: You need to identify individuals in images or videos.
You are developing a security system that requires user verification.
You want to implement real-time monitoring features.
You are working on a mobile application that requires user authentication.
You have a dataset of facial images for training a model.

approaches.best_for: Building a facial recognition system for security applications and real-time user authentication.
approaches.key_tradeoff: While GSO-CNN provides high accuracy, it may require significant computational resources.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need a robust facial recognition system with high accuracy for security or authentication.

start_here: Start with GSO-CNN as it is specifically designed for facial recognition tasks and has shown promising results in relevant applications.
